title: Slot Flaw Scofflaws
description: Where there are casinos, there are people trying to cheat. And now, they're using iPhones. | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.

itunes:title: Slot Flaw Scofflaws
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Where there are casinos, there are wannabe cheaters. One group of Russian hackers cracked slot machines with math, iPhones, and a whole lot of swiping.
